definitions.text: an authoritative direction or instruction to do something
(bridge) the number of tricks a bridge player is willing to contract to make

examples: The Swiss dealer offered $2 million for the painting
The prophet bid all people to become good persons

definitions.text: make a demand, as for a card or a suit or a show of hands
make a serious effort to attain something
examples: His campaign bid for the attention of the poor population

definitions.text: ask someone in a friendly way to do something
